Removal

You are seeing the removal link at the bottom of the paste because you have posted the paste you are viewing.

Clicking on the link allows you remove a paste from bpaste.net.

If you have inadvertently removed your cookies and think it is important your paste gets removed before it hits the expiry date you can contact me at {{ config.ABUSE_EMAIL }}. You should also contact me there if you have doubts about the contents of a paste being of a legal nature.
